qas.question: What has been the trend lately in the Egypt economy?
What area of business have boomed lately in Egypt?
What was change made to corporate taxes in 2005?

answers.text: decreased corporate taxes from 40% to the current 20%

qas.question: What ws the overall impact to tax revenue from change of corporate tax rate?

answers.text: 100% increase in tax revenue by the year 2006

context: Economic conditions have started to <a0_0>improve considerably<a0_0/>, after a period of stagnation, due to the adoption of more liberal economic policies by the government as well as increased revenues from tourism and a booming <a1_0>stock market<a1_0/>. In its annual report, the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has rated Egypt as one of the top countries in the world undertaking economic reforms. Some major economic reforms undertaken by the government since 2003 include a dramatic slashing of customs and tariffs. A new taxation law implemented in 2005 <a2_0>decreased corporate taxes from 40% to the current 20%<a2_0/>, resulting in a stated <a3_0>100% increase in tax revenue by the year 2006<a3_0/>.
